mapper.select: select main_num, main_writeday, decode(main_option,'1','지출','수입') main_option, main_account, main_content, main_price from mainBoard where main_num = #{num}
mapper.update: update mainboard set main_writeday=#{main_writeday},main_content=#{main_content}, main_price=#{main_price} where main_num=#{main_num}
